document_data.name: Adrik Commorand
document_data.mainbody: '''Adrik Commorand''' was a sorcerous mercenary in the late 14{{th}} century DR operating in the [[Unapproachable East]].
document_data.Abilities: Adrik could cast a spell to null an enemy red wizard's flight.{{cite book/Stardeep|85|8}} He could also throw ''[[fireball]]s'',{{cite book/Stardeep|148|12}} ''[[cone of cold]]''{{cite book/Stardeep|218-226|20}}, and a spell similar to ''[[light]]''.
document_data.Activities: Adrik was a mercenary sorcerer and adventuring seeker of magical lore, plundering tombs, studying esoteric topics, and witnessing magic far and wide.
document_data.Relationships: Adrik and his brother mostly traveled together.{{cite book/Stardeep|259-261|25}}
